absolute_radiance.name: Absolute Radiance
absolute_radiance.desc: Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental status effects for a short duration.

protagonist_syndrome.name: Protagonist Syndrome
protagonist_syndrome.desc: The grasp of shadow is meaningless in the face of your blinding light. Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after being hit by Shadowcast.

oath_dawnwalker.name: Oath: Dawnwalker
oath_dawnwalker.desc: You vow to forever reach towards the brilliant Light. There is no shadow that your radiance cannot expunge.

luminous_flash.name: Luminous Flash
luminous_flash.desc: After dealing a certain amount of damage while in 'Absolute Radiance', gain a chance to empower your strikes with pure light.
